short_summary: Bids are invited for a road maintenance contract in Banff National Park.
description: Bids are invited for a road maintenance contract in Banff National Park. The contract involves performing road maintenance tasks in the park, including crack sealing and slurry seal application. The contractor will be responsible for performing the work in accordance with the National Park Act and all relevant regulations.

full_summary:
```markdown
# Road Maintenance - Banff National Park
# Call for Tender - Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0136/A

## Project Details
The Parks Canada Agency seeks to engage a contractor for road maintenance in Banff National Park. The project entails sealing cracks in the asphalt and applying an isolated slurry seal to aged/segregated asphalt.

## Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: August 9, 2023, 4:00 PM (local time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 18, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: October 13, 2023

## Tender Requirements
The contractor shall complete the work on time, according to the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents. The locations for Crack Sealing and Spray Patching are to be prioritized in order of importance as listed in the tender documents.

## Enquiries and Solicitation
All enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and should be received no later than five (5) business days prior to the date set for solicitation closing to allow sufficient time for a response.

## Bonding and Insurance Requirements
This project is estimated to be in excess of $100,000 and less than $250,000. The contractor is required to provide necessary bonding and insurance for the project.

## Tender Documents
The tender documents, including any addenda, can be obtained from the Government of Canada's tendering service website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

## Method of Tender
The sole acceptable method of tendering for this project is by fax or email. Bids will be accepted via fax at 1-855-983-1808 or by email at [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).

## Contact Information
For all inquiries related to this tender, please contact:
Alison Guilford
Parks Canada Agency
145 McDermot Avenue, Winnipeg, MB, R3B 0R9
Phone: 204-390-7234
Email: [alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca)
Fax: 1-855-983-1808"

```
